EmailTemplate.name: Rebranding URL Change Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Changes to eCommerce and PartnerLink URL
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
On September 17, 2013, Sauer-Danfoss will officially change its name and brand to begin operating as a member of the Danfoss Group.
Please see the attached document for information regarding web address changes occurring next week.
Best regards,
Molly Redenbaug eBusiness Channel Manager Sauer-Danfoss, Inc.
